website_summaries.verdict: A good budget spray gel option for those who want a quality hold without the higher price tag.
pros: Formula uses natural ingredients for extra healing properties
Has a high degree of volume and manageability
Good for both thin and thick hair types alike
cons: Does not thicken as much as other high-quality hair products

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot more from this product. When something says it will "thicken" or give lots of body & fullness, most products deliver. This one does not. I have very fine thin hair & this barely gave me an ounce of body. Very disappointed & not worth the $. =(
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Must have hair product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for many years. I love it and I keep ordering it when I run out. It works on long hair or short hair bleached hair and gray hair.
customer_reviews.author: Innovation

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells fresh. Adds volume without stickiness. I only spray roots. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: LadyC

customer_reviews.title: Volume Without Weight
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, thin hair and AQUAGE Thickening Spraygel is the only product that gives me some volume without weighing my hair down.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great on fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: This product helps my fine hair have some body and makes it easier to style. I can even redo my hair after a day and this helps my hair look fuller without weighing it down.
customer_reviews.author: nancz

customer_reviews.title: Great volume without a lot of reside.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Great price. My beautician chargesl $20.00 for the 8 oz size.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Garant

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite blow dry gel. Soft and natural looking. Smells fresh and nice.
customer_reviews.author: tygertyger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and gives my hair wonderful lift and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly M.

customer_reviews.title: Great hold with a light spray
customer_reviews.text: If you want very light non-sticky hold, buy Aquage Thickening Spraygel.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to give body to thin and baby fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector 12

customer_reviews.title: Aquage thickening gel
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great. Gives my hair volume and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: DRL

customer_reviews.title: It works! While keeping hair soft
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Volume without crunch or stickiness. It’s the best I’ve found to take fine hair and give lasting volume.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: It's more like a hair spray
customer_reviews.text: It's more like a hair spray, not a hair thickening gel. Plus I was charged for 4 10oz bottles than 2. Please correct my payment. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Barbo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to the product from my hair stylist and fell in love with it. I use it all the time. It really holds my hair in place and keeps my hair soft at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: bjpetry

customer_reviews.title: I love Aquage products!
customer_reviews.text: I love Aquage products. Arrived as expected. Not heavy on hair.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Like it had been watered down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased at a salon before. This bottle from Amazon, was not as thick. Like it had been watered down. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found yet
customer_reviews.text: I was buying this at a local spa but they stopped stocking it so I did what every desperate person does-went to Amazon to see if they carried it. I've been using this product for years and it solves my thinning-hair problem perfectly with no stiffness and no nasty smell.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Mackintosh

customer_reviews.title: Great hair care product!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my short, fine hair that needs a volume boost.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L.

customer_reviews.title: Baby fine hair gets major help from this
customer_reviews.text: Love this thickening spray styling gel. Helps my baby fine hair hold a style. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michele Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well !
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, limp hair and this gel adds some volume
customer_reviews.author: N. Samson

customer_reviews.title: Spray gel,
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff it helps me out when my perms don't turn out the way they are supposed to and this gel gives a little curl to help
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair and someone gave me my first bottle of this and it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo1930

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works great and smells wonderful! I use to hold curls, scrunch my wet hair and go, and even use on my toddler boy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: HGE

customer_reviews.title: Really adds volume
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Gives my fine hair the volume it needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cathrine Frazer

customer_reviews.title: great results
customer_reviews.text: love this thickening hair gel. my hair is fine, so my hairdresser introduced me to this gel. i ran out of my 2 oz bottle, and found this fantastic deal on amazon. received exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Scott

customer_reviews.title: BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really light mist that gives your hair added thickness and volume! A+++. It lasts awhile too! Would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: in His grip

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Use it everyday and have had many compliments on how good my hair looks. Will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great on my thin hair to add volume without being sticky
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved Aquage products. The smell is just amazing and the products have always worked great for me. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Aquage Thickening spray
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It makes my fine hair feel much thicker. I will continue to order this item from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: hair thickener
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff - works great! Does not weigh fine hair down, even in humidity. Don't know what I did before. Arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Piper Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, but hate that it is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: LoveSully&Simon

customer_reviews.title: I have to say this is amazing spray gel
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to spend so much money on hair gel but I read reviews and gave it a try. I have to say this is amazing spray gel. My hair was not sticky and stiff- it was full and shiny- definetly worth the money A+++++
customer_reviews.author: pearl castaldo

product_meta.title: AQUAGE Thickening Spraygel, 10 oz.
product_meta.description:
Award winning Aquage Thickening Spraygel is a firm hold, body building styling spray that's ideal for fine, thin hair that lacks body. It thickens and strengthens as you style with Ultraflex polymer technology with sea botanicals. This styling spray delivers long-lasting volume and style retention, never flakes and is ideal for men's styling.

BRAND STORY
Empowering artists through custom-blended haircare. Professional haircare products inspired by the sea. Delivering ultimate styling results
